title: Novel mono substituted pyridoimidazoisoquinoliniums via a silver-catalyzed intramolecular cyclization and their applications in cellular imaging
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,9758-9762
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01210K, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Masato Kawakubo, Yoshikazu Inoh, Yuki Murata, Mio Matsumura, Tadahide Furuno, Shuji Yasuike
Intramolecular cyclization to obtain mitochondrially localized pyrido[1′,2′;2,3]imidazo[5,1-a]isoquinoliniums proceeded with Ag catalysts at room temperature with a short reaction time.
